EmailTemplate.subject: Earth Hour 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
On Monday 31st March, all students at ISM will take part in celebrating Earth Hour. During Earth Hour events are held in thousands of cities worldwide (29th March at 8.30 â€“ 9.30pm local time) to raise awareness and demonstrate support for environmental protection. Please click here to download more information.
Michelle Hamilton
Secondary Phase Leader
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
